ExampleDefinition.Title: Series Vertical Slices
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates usage of VerticalSliceModifier for getting slices of series like when using RolloverModifier. You can add, remove and interact with slices
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Series Vertical Slices</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Demonstrates usage of VerticalSliceModifier for getting slices of series like when using RolloverModifier.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic">Tip!</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic">You can add and remove slices on chart.
